attributes.action: GCSEs: More options=more opportunities to inspire young people.
attributes.background:
Diversity should be embraced.

Students should be given the opportunity to discover their educational passion in life through a wide selection of GCSE subjects such as Law, Marine Biology, Animation, Mental Health Counselling, Martial Arts/Self Defence, Sailing, Politics, E-Commerce, Social Media.

rejection.details: Apart from compulsory subjects, it's up to schools to decide which subjects they want to offer.
